start_msg: Hello! This bot protects public chats from spam bots. Please prove you're not a robot by solving a math problem shown below
no_captcha_requested: You did not request a CAPTCHA. Please send /start command
temp_block: Sorry, you've been temporarily blocked! Please try again later
verified: Successfully verified! You can go back to the chat
welcome_msg: Hello, @{0}! I'm an anti-spam bot. Please send me a start command in personal messages and solve a CAPTCHA challenge to join the chat
